title: Ticket #2733: Incorporate statistics into the startd
description: In CHTC, we run jobs via flocking from many schedd's. With schedd-only statistics, we need to query every schedd for statistics. We can localize the throughput information for CHTC by implementing statistics in the startd.
remarks: This ticket is no longer relevant. Startd statistics were added in 8.1.2 by gthain.
creator: nwp
